siteMetadata.title: Curt Miller, material studies
siteMetadata.description: Web transcriptions: studies of physical materials for the modern browser.

markdownRemark.html: Studies of print materials primarily from the 1950’s and 60’s including ad brochures, record covers and works by Josef Albers.
